description: In Android before 2018-04-05 or earlier security patch level on Qualcomm Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, and Snapdragon Wear MDM9206, MDM9607, MDM9635M, MDM9650, MSM8909W, SD 210/SD 212/SD 205, SD 400, SD 410/12, SD 425, SD 430, SD 450, SD 615/16/SD 415, SD 617, SD 625, SD 650/52, SD 800, SD 808, SD 810, SD 820, SD 820A, SD 835, SD 845, and SD 850, integer overflow may occur when values passed from HLOS (graphics driver busy time, and total time) in TZBSP_GFX_DCVS_UPDATE_ID are very large.

product.name: Snapdragon Automobile, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Wear
